name: Teleport Enterprises, Inc.
description: Developer of a marketing platform designed to connect brands and businesses with their audience. The company's platform uses geo-fencing and audience analysis to provide digital strategies with on-brand messaging, enabling clients to understand their audiences and maximize the reach of their campaigns.
